concept.title: Load and Run LISP Program
concept.shortdesc: LISP programis available only after loading, while how to apply a LISP programrelies on the program

conbody.p: itself. If functions are created in programs, it can be performed just like executing commands in ZWCAD. Most of the LISP functions are provided with prompts instructing how to use them. You can load LISP programto ZWCAD before executing this programas performing APPLOAD command.
